description: Remove all data in the current work item.
Delete variable(s) from the current work item. :param names: names of variables to remove :param force: ignore variables that don't exist in work item
Get the full JSON payload for a work item. NOTE: Most use cases should prefer higher-level keywords.

Return a single variable value from the work item, or default value if defined and key does not exist. If key does not exist and default is not defined, raises KeyError. :param key: Name of variable :param default: Default value if key does not exist
Read all variables from the current work item and return their names and values as a dictionary.
List the variable names for the current work item.
Load work item for reading/writing. :param workspace_id: Workspace ID which contains item :param item_id: Workitem ID to load
Load current work item defined by the runtime environment. The corresponding environment variables are: * RC_WORKSPACE_ID * RC_WORKITEM_ID
Save the current data in the work item. If not saved, all changes are discarded when the library goes out of scope.

keyword: Set Task Variables From Work Item
description: Convert all variables in the current work item to Robot Framework task variables.
Set the full JSON payload for a work item. NOTE: Most use cases should prefer higher-level keywords. :param payload: Content of payload, must be JSON-serializable
Set a single variable value in the current work item. :param key: Name of variable :param value: Value of variable
Set multiple variables in the current work item. :param kwargs: Pairs of variable names and values
